verses.verse: Thou also <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, take <WH3947> thee a tile <WH3843>, and lay <WH5414> it before <WH6440> thee <WH2710>, and portray upon it a city <WH5892>, even Jerusalem <WH3389>:

and lay <WH5414> siege <WH4692> against it <WH1129>, and build forts <WH1785> against it <WH8210>, and cast up a mound <WH5550> against it <WH5414>; set camps <WH4264> also against it <WH7760>, and plant battering rams <WH3733> against it round about <WH5439>.

And take <WH3947> thou unto thee an iron <WH1270> pan <WH4227>, and set <WH5414> it for a wall <WH7023> of iron <WH1270> between thee and the city <WH5892>: and set <WH3559> thy face <WH6440> toward it <WH4692>, and it shall be besieged, and thou shalt lay siege <WH6696> against it <WH226>. This shall be a sign to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

Moreover lie <WH7901> thou upon thy left <WH8042> side <WH6654>, and lay <WH7760> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> upon it <WH4557>; according to the number of the days <WH3117> that thou shalt lie <WH7901> upon it <WH5375>, thou shalt bear their iniquity <WH5771>.

For I have appointed <WH5414> the years <WH8141> of their iniquity <WH5771> to be unto thee a number <WH4557> of days <WH3117>, even three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117>: so shalt thou bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

And again <WH8145>, when thou hast accomplished <WH3615> these <WH428>, thou shalt lie <WH7901> on thy right <WH3233> side <WH6654>, and shalt bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063>: forty <WH705> days <WH3117>, each day <WH3117> for a year <WH8141>, have I appointed it unto thee <WH5414>.
And thou shalt set <WH3559> thy face <WH6440> toward the siege <WH4692> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, with thine arm <WH2220> uncovered <WH2834>; and thou shalt prophesy against it <WH5012>.

And <WH5414>, behold, I lay bands <WH5688> upon thee <WH2015>, and thou shalt not turn thee from one side <WH6654> to the other <WH6654>, till thou hast accomplished <WH3615> the days <WH3117> of thy siege <WH4692>.

Take <WH3947> thou also unto thee wheat <WH2406>, and barley <WH8184>, and beans <WH6321>, and lentils <WH5742>, and millet <WH1764>, and spelt <WH3698>, and put <WH5414> them in one <WH259> vessel <WH3627>, and make <WH6213> thee bread <WH3899> thereof <WH4557>; according to the number of the days <WH3117> that thou shalt lie <WH7901> upon thy side <WH6654>, even three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673> days <WH3117>, shalt thou eat thereof <WH398>.
And thy food <WH3978> which thou shalt eat <WH398> shall be by weight <WH4946>, twenty <WH6242> shekels <WH8255> a day <WH3117>: from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> shalt thou eat it <WH398>.
And thou shalt drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> by measure <WH4884>, the sixth part <WH8345> of a hin <WH1969>: from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> shalt thou drink <WH8354>.
And thou shalt eat <WH398> it as barley <WH8184> cakes <WH5692>, and thou shalt bake <WH5746> it in their sight <WH5869> with dung <WH1561> that cometh out <WH6627> of man <WH120>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, Even thus shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> eat <WH398> their bread <WH3899> unclean <WH2931>, among the nations <WH1471> whither I will drive them <WH5080>.

Then said <WH559> I <WH162>, Ah Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>! behold <WH5315>, my soul hath not been polluted <WH2930>; for from my youth <WH5271> up even till now have I not eaten <WH398> of that which dieth of itself <WH5038>, or is torn <WH2966> of beasts <WH935>; neither came there abominable <WH6292> flesh <WH1320> into my mouth <WH6310>.
Then he said <WH559> unto me <WH7200>, See, I have given <WH5414> thee cow <WH1241>'s dung <WH6832> for man <WH120>'s dung <WH1561>, and thou shalt prepare <WH6213> thy bread thereon <WH3899>.

Moreover he said <WH559> unto me <WH1121>, Son of man <WH120>, behold <WH7665>, I will break the staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899> in Jerusalem <WH3389>: and they shall eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> by weight <WH4948>, and with fearfulness <WH1674>; and they shall drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> by measure <WH4884>, and in dismay <WH8078>:
that they may want <WH2637> bread <WH3899> and water <WH4325>, and be dismayed <WH8074> one <WH376> with another <WH251>, and pine away <WH4743> in their iniquity <WH5771>.
